text: The Tragedy of Macbeth is a 2021 American historical drama thriller movie written and directed by Joel Coen. It is based on the play Macbeth by William Shakespeare. It stars Denzel Washington, Frances McDormand, Bertie Carvel, Alex Hassell, Corey Hawkins, Harry Melling, Kathryn Hunter, and Brendan Gleeson. It was released on Apple TV+ on December 25, 2021. ==References== Category:2021 drama movies Category:2021 thriller movies Category:Movies directed by the Coen brothers Category:American drama thriller movies Category:Movies based on plays by William Shakespeare
title: The Tragedy of Macbeth (2021 movie)
